item.title: Creating a deterministic guid
item.description: Daily Knowledge Drop The MD5 algorithm implementation in conjunction with string encoding can be used to create a deterministic guid based on string value. Use case Assume you are writing a system, and are using guids as primary keys for all of your data. You are required to consume employee data supplied by a third party - however this data doesn’t have a primary key as such, but uses a string employee number to unique identify an employee.
